text: Some day, when things calm down, I'll tell the real story of @JoeNBC and his very insecure long-time girlfriend, @morningmika. Two clowns!

snippet: hit job book on me...inaccurate stories....don't buy, boring
text: The @WashingtonPost quickly put together a hit job book on me- comprised of copies of some of their inaccurate stories. Don't buy, boring!

snippet: crazy @morningmika...@pastormarkburns was attacked viciously and unfairly
text: Wonderful @pastormarkburns was attacked viciously and unfairly on @MSNBC by crazy @morningmika on low ratings @Morning_Joe. Apologize!

snippet: crazy and very dumb @morningmika had a mental breakdown while talking about me
text: Just heard that crazy and very dumb @morningmika had a mental breakdown while talking about me on the low ratings @Morning_Joe. Joe a mess!

snippet: so disgusting in their bias
text: .@CNN is so disgusting in their bias, but they are having a hard time promoting Crooked Hillary in light of the new e-mail scandals.

snippet: failed @NBC and he is now failing @CNN
text: Jeff Zucker failed @NBC and he is now failing @CNN.

snippet: unwatchable...news on me is fiction...disgrace to the broadcasting industry...arm of the Clinton campaign.
text:
.@CNN is unwatchable. Their news on me is fiction. They
are a disgrace to the broadcasting industry and an arm of the Clinton campaign.

snippet: irrelevant dope
text: I havn't seen @tonyschwartz in many years, he hardly knows me. Never liked his style. Super lib, Crooked H supporter. Irrelevant dope!

snippet: dummy writer...hostile basket case who feels jilted
text: Dummy writer @tonyschwartz, who wanted to do a second book with me for years (I said no), is now a hostile basket case who feels jilted!
